For sale is this 1914 B18 Ty Cobb felt blanket in technically POOR condition due to a missing/torn upper corner. The image and color are nice and there is light background spotting. Still displays nicely..........$SOLD shipped

Price includes shipping. Payment via Paypal 'Gift' or price plus 3% for regular Paypal ONLY. Please PM me to buy or with questions. Thanks.........Matt
